So tell me, what do you think I can do to deal with this? And is it the fault of the liar for lying, or me for believing the lie? 

     sounds like you need to get lost on an adventure through some wikipedia lists

     no it didn't

12.4.19  4:05 pm   why why why dont propriately software packages supply keyboard shortcuts to KEY FUNCTIONALITY? this really makes no sense to me at all

12.4.19  4:04 pm   Can you write me a haiku that makes me laugh and cry at the same time

     it would have to be set to a musical melody, which, according to my personal theory, is the way haiku was actually meant to be, before it became so widely known as an american 4th grade counting exercise

     the whole wheel

12.4.19  3:40 pm    i feel like you're very quick to put the kabosh on analogous thinking, stepping in with an implication to remind the asker that the subjects in question are not entirely alike at all, and are both wonderful and terrible in their own ways. You do this with common structures for questions, as well. I have a great respect for it, because it feels like you're stopping generalization and forcing people to look even harder at things. However, I am in a cognitive science class, and it is teaching me that analogy is fairly specific to humans, and it might be what has allowed us to advance beyond other species. We can apply learned information in a highly abstract way to many facets of our lives when we recognize similar structure, whereas other animals cannot. So now I am torn! What do you make of this?

     plagiarism

12.4.19  3:18 pm   How do I get better at handshakes?

     use reverse psychology, do it bad and then blame the other person

12.4.19  3:03 pm   i'm writing a research paper about your christmas isn't real video and i'm desperately analyzing it

     it was written in 2 parts. the 1st line (up to 'jesus'), and the rest. like many songs i write nowadays, it is written as if by 2 different people holding 2 different job titles, the Starter and the Finisher. the Starter's job is to come up with a line that could be made into a song, then hand it over to the Finisher saying 'here, you fuckin deal with it.' and then create more starter ideas for more songs. that's all the Starter does. just start songs and throw them into the starter bank. and the Finisher's job is to take the half baked crap that the Starter hands over, and find a way to deal with it. there is actually a very important 3rd job title which i haven't mentioned, who decides which one of the Starter's ideas to give to the Finisher. that would be the Selector. this is to ensure that the Finisher is not impeded by the horrific doubts of 'questioning the Selection'

12.4.19  2:58 pm   do you like it or hate it when people ask a question that is a quote from one of your songs

     it makes me stronger each time

12.4.19  2:49 pm   What is the purpose of an egg?

     get laid

12.4.19  2:41 pm   I have a question

     i want to believe you

12.4.19  2:26 pm   bill youve cultivated a public identity that is far more powerful than you actually are

     not exactly .... it's not more powerful, it's just louder. and i find myself constantly having to steer it back to the intended proper flavor, without being distracted by the constant stream of requests for my opinions on bread

      (which is the secret, right? and it's probably made you personally cooler in the process).

     stronger

      So i'm sitting here imagining what that must be like and it is TERRIFYING and AWFUL! am i off base in my assumptions or is this something you live with.

     it can be hugely terrifying, but how else am i gonna meet tom cruise. that's the whole reason i got into this

      i would love to know more about how it feels to live and be known, talked about, to see if maybe i'd like to try it one day. and i trust your judgement

     it might make you feel strangely ill in ways you never imagined, but here's the question: would you actually feel more ill without it

12.4.19  1:53 pm   What do you think about making some new counties

     it's pretty cool, the best part is you get to be the sheriff

     not big enough
